title: Turkey Flat 2017 Rosé (Barossa Valley)
description: Ballerina pink in hue, this light, pretty rosé is uncomplicated, with notes of ripe red berries, refreshing acidity and just the slightest hint of sweetness. Knock back with shellfish or a fresh, fruit salad on a hot summer's day.

title: Agate Ridge 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Southern Oregon)
description: This is stiff and tannic, with more herbal flavors than fruit. Tomato leaf and olive highlights are evident, around light, thin red berry notes.

title: Agate Ridge 2015 Ridge Rock Red (Rogue Valley)
description: A blend of Syrah and Petite Sirah, this heavyset red is loaded with vanilla, mocha and graham cracker flavors. There's some chunky cherry fruit buried in the background, with notes of chocolate and vanilla winning out.

title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2015 Estate Merlot (Alexander Valley)
description: This medium-bodied wine has a dusty grip of clove and tobacco, savory elements that play well against a backdrop of soft expansive dark cherry and cassis.

title: Borsao 2016 Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
description: Both on the nose and palate, this Garnacha is mildly angular and pinching, with a sense of rawness brought on by hard tannins. Its foxy plum flavors are jumpy and nervy, finishing peppery and jagged.

title: Bridgman 2016 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: This wine offers spice and blue and purple fruit aromas. Sweet boysenberry flavors follow. It's a straightforward, varietally correct quaffer.

title: Casa Agricola Alexandre Relvas 2017 Herdade de São Miguel Colheita Seleccionada Rosé (Alentejano)
description: This bright, fruity blend of Aragonez and Touriga Nacional is full of red fruits. It has a touch of warmth from the sunny Alentejo although its main thrust is crisp acidity and zesty fruitiness. Drink now.
designation: Herdade de São Miguel Colheita Seleccionada

title: Casas del Toqui 2017 Coastal Mist Terroir Selection Sauvignon Blanc (Colchagua Valley)
description: This wine has subdued vegetal aromas and melon and honey scents that provide sweetness. It's fresh, firm and lean on the palate, with quick-hitting acidity. Short on fruit flavors, it's heavier on the green stuff, with lasting vegetal notes and a salty finish.

title: Casca Wines 2017 Cascas Branco White (Lisboa)
description: From an attractive blend that includes 30% Chardonnay, this is a soft, rounded wine. The cool, crisp edge reflects the region's ocean influence. It has refreshing immediate drinkability.

title: Cerulean 2013 Acadia Vineyards Pinot Noir (Columbia Gorge (WA))
description: Light in color, this offers mint and raspberry aromas. The flavors are quite light and elegant, almost seeming faint, with smoky notes on the finish.

title: Cruz de Alba 2014 Crianza  (Ribera del Duero)
description: This has intense smoky, minty and herbal aromas, without much fruit. It's lemony and wiry on the palate, with sour plum and currant flavors that taste woody, spicy and minty on the finish. A lean and sharp rendition of Tempranillo.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2015 Segada Red (Lisboa)
description: Full of berry fruits, this wine blends Touriga Nacional, Alfrocheiro and Merlot. It is ripe, juicy, perfumed and has good balance between acidity and fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Domaine de Ménard 2016 Prestige White (Côtes de Gascogne)
description: Just off dry, this blend of Petit Manseng and Gros Manseng is intensely herbal while the obviously ripe fruits give a honey edge to the acidity and the zesty character. Drink this wine from 2019.

title: Falua 2016 Conde Vimioso Colheita Seleccionada Red (Tejo)
description: This wine full of black fruit is perfumed, ripe and lightly structured. Soft tannins support the berry flavors, juicy acidity and warm aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Herederos de Argüeso NV San León Palomino (Manzanilla-Sanlúcar de Barrameda)
description: This round, creamy and oxidized wine has dusty, resiny aromas suggesting almond and pine. Its salty citrus and banana flavors are earthy and lighty vegetal on the finish.

title: I Capitani 2017 Clarum Falanghina (Irpinia)
description: Aromas of exotic fruit, banana and a whiff of wild herb lead the nose. The round ripe palate offers candied notes, passion fruit and vanilla.

title: Kramer 2016 Celebrate Pinot Gris (Yamhill-Carlton)
description: Kramer's Celebrate series features non-traditional sparkling wine grapes that are carbonated in tank rather than re-fermented in the bottle. This is light, tart and dry, with delicate hints of spearmint gum and grapefruit. It's a good mixer.

title: Landshut 2016 Riesling (Mosel)
description: While the nose is quite muted here, straightforward apple and lemon flavors are augmented by high-toned acidity and a filigreed lace of sweetness. It's an easy-drinking medium-sweet wine with a hint of herbaceousness on the finish. Drink now.

title: Luis Felipe Edwards 2015 LFE 900 Malbec (Colchagua Valley)
description: This Malbec's earthy black fruit and cassis aromas are deep and stewy. The palate is ribbed with fierce tannins, and its blackened berry flavors are covered with oak. It breaks down further on the finish and tastes green.

title: Masseria Frattasi 2016 Bonea  (Falanghina del Sannio)
description: This simple white wine offers flavors suggesting nectarine, pineapple and candied citrus slice. It's bright, with fresh acidity.

title: Masseria Frattasi 2016 Donna Laura  (Falanghina del Sannio)
description: Subdued aromas of grapefruit, pineapple and a whiff of toast lead the nose. On the rounded, rather syrupy palate, fresh acidity lifts flavors reminiscent of candied orange slice.

title: Member's Mark 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
description: Tightly tannic and brimming with oak flavor, this full-bodied effort shows a wealth of vanilla and cherry-cream flavors, as well as a strong streak of baked bread and dusty clove.

title: Messias 2016 Quinta do Valdoeiro Branco White (Bairrada)
description: Arinto, Bical and Chardonnay layer this wine with crisp citrus and green flavors along with attractive minerality. The wine has great fruitiness as well as bright acidity and a tangy aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Poggio Morino 2013 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
description: Subdued aromas of baking spice and black-skinned fruit emerge in the glass. The straightforward palate offers plum, star anise and a hint of white pepper alongside supple, rather evolved tannins.

title: Rigal 2016 Les Fiefs d'Anglars Malbec (Comté Tolosan)
description: This soft, fruity wine is full of black-currant and blackberry flavors. Its gentle and poised tannins result from the lightest extraction, leaving the fruit to sing. Drink this open wine now.

title: Tanner 2014 Estate Grown Carignane (Sierra Foothills)
description: Very fruity and supple, this medium-bodied wine has a baked plum aroma. The smooth palate brings a brighter Bing cherry tone, with a good lick of acidity and soft tannins.

title: The Blending Lab 2015 eCS Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description: Balsamic-cherry reduction aromas meet with woody herbs and a pinch of pyrazines on the nose of this bottling. It's somewhat green in character on the sip as well, with a wide variety of dried herbs sprinkled over cooked strawberry fruit.

title: Viña Leyda 2015 Single Vineyard Neblina Riesling (Leyda Valley)
description: Oily petrol aromas signal this is Riesling, but it otherwise offers little fruit or charm on the nose. Its full and lively palate bursts with acidity, tasting of lemon and pineapple. It falls off on the finish, showing oxidized, bready flavors.

title: Chalk Hill 2016 Windy Ridge Sauvignon Blanc (Chalk Hill)
description: Exotic in a nose of lemongrass and papaya, this medium-bodied white becomes slightly sweet on the palate, showing an overripe succulence accented in spritzy acidity and freshly cut grass.

title: Chilensis 2016 Reserva Estate Bottled Pinot Noir (Maule Valley)
description: Spicy currant and pie cherry aromas lead to an easygoing, light-bodied palate in this simple Pinot Noir. It's is built of peppery, lightly oaked currant and cocoa flavors, while a riper note of red plum emerges on the finish.
